Digital Clock with Roman Numeral Display

To accurately update the displayed time, the RomanDigital widget requires user permission to set exact alarms. 

Without this permission, the widget will be updated at inexact times, causing the displayed time to lag the system clock. 

Click the button below and set the option on the resulting screen to grant the required permission.
The RomanDigital widget currently has permission to set exact alarms so it can accurately update the displayed time.

An error has caused RomanDigital to stop running. The developer can work to fix it, but only if he finds out about it.

If you have an email app set up then you can help!

Click OK to automatically generate an email with bug report attached that you can then send.

You can add any comments regarding the crash that you think might be helpful to the autogenerated email.

Your email address won't be kept or otherwise used unless you ask a question or provide a comment necessitating a reply.

Thanks in advance!
